entities.name: healer strout
entities.description: Healer Strout is mentioned as being busy over the Christmas period and overlooking the dangers of the plant on Mr. Bode's bedside table.

entities.name: mr bode
entities.description: Mr. Bode is a patient in St. Mungo's hospital who was throttled by the Devil's Snare plant.

entities.name: devil's snare
entities.description: The Devil's Snare plant is mentioned as being mistaken for an innocent Flitterbloom and causing Mr. Bode's death.

entities.name: flitterbloom
entities.description: Flitterbloom is mentioned as a harmless plant that was mistaken for the Devil's Snare.

entities.name: st mungo's
entities.description: St. Mungo's hospital is where Mr. Bode was being treated and where the Devil's Snare plant was found.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as trying to remember something about a person named Bode.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as remembering seeing Mr. Bode in St. Mungo's hospital.

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Lockhart is mentioned as having a bed opposite to where Mr. Bode was lying in St. Mungo's hospital.

relationships.description: Healer Strout mistook the Devil's Snare plant for an innocent Flitterbloom.
Mr. Bode was throttled by the Devil's Snare plant.
Ron is trying to remember something about a person named Bode.
Hermione saw Mr. Bode in St. Mungo's hospital.
Lockhart is located near St. Mungo's hospital.
